enWisdom: Wealth strengthens one who [is weak and] lacks support
Riches turn one who is not a master into a master
The rich person feels at home [even when he is] in a strange land

Wisdom: أَلَا وَإِنَّ مِنَ النِّعَمِ سَعَةَ الْمَالِ وَأَفْضَلَ مِنْ سَعَةِ الْمَالِ صِحَّةُ الْبَدَنِ وَأَفْضَلَ مِنْ صِحَّةِ الْبَدَنِ تَقْوَى الْقَلْبِ
enWisdom: Indeed, one of the blessings is affluence, but good health is better than affluence, and the God-wariness of the heart is [even] better than good health
One of the most pleasant blessings is abundant sustenance
What a good blessing abundant sustenance is!
